thread.title: Abortion law to be devolved to Holyrood
thread.title_full: Abortion law to be devolved to Holyrood - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Abortion law to be devolved to Holyrood
text:
20
Have your say Abortion law is to be devolved to Holyrood in the Scotland Bill, Scottish Secretary David Mundell has announced.
The decision comes despite opposition to devolution of abortion by women’s and human rights groups and a decision by the all-party Smith Commission not to put it in as a final recommendations.
Giving evidence to the Scottish Affairs Select Committee, Mr Mundell said he had exchanged “a considerable amount of correspondence” with Deputy First Minister John Swinney.
